project_name.description: Name of project (press enter to use default name)

jar_dest_path.description: Destination path in Databricks where the JAR will be stored. TODO: instructions on creating /Volumes

cluster_key.description: Enter the cluster key for an existing cluster or leave empty to create a new cluster

cluster_type.description: Select cluster type: Dedicated or Standard

jar_allowlisted.description: If Standard, is the JAR allowlisted by the admin for your workspace? (If not, inform admin: https://docs.databricks.com/en/data-governance/unity-catalog/manage-privileges/allowlist.html, otherwise type true)

main_class_name.description: Main class name including package (entry point of the JAR execution)

scala_version.description: Scala version (e.g., 2.12). Run scala -version to find it. Note: Only support 2.12 and 2.13

scala_maintenance_version.description: Scala maintenance version (e.g., 12). Run scala -version to find it.
